div.style: border:0px; border-left-width:1px; border-left-style:solid; border-left-color:black; border-top-width:3px; border-top-style:solid; border-top-color:[IFNOT headSet][bgresumecolor][ENDIF headSet][IF headSet][evglobalstate][ENDIF headSet]; background-color:[bgresumecolor]; height:100%; color:[textcolor]; text-transform:lowercase;
